replies.body: LMAO, good to see some of the original forums posters still exist :D

> how far back is original?

This^

Do I count as "original" at this point?
HeartVine please go back to the treelady icon that's how I remember you!

No.

I've had the heart icon since original Doombots, and it fits a lot better with my name.

i'd say everyone in this thread counts

Hmm, hard to say, late season 2 is as far as i go back, so maybe around then

RainbowWindslash was there, you, roguestoney, niji, and a few others, whose names have changed over time
